===================================================================================================================
## 2. Steps

1) Open: http://remix.ethereum.org
2) File explorer: OBPay.sol and alt_bn128.sol
3) Choose: Environment(Solidity), Compiler (0.4.19+commit.c4cbbb05), EVM Version (0.4.19+commit.c4cbbb05)
4) Compile
5) Deploy 
6) Invoke
